Plugin Configuration

This plugin can be configured several ways:

  • pom parameters
    <plugin>
  <configuration>
    <parameter1>value</parameter1>
    ...
  </configuration>
</plugin>
  • defines given to the maven command line
    mvn -Dparameter1=value ...

Grouped Parameter Summary

For the default values please refer to the specific class documentation.

Dialyzer

  • skipDialyzer: will skip the dialyzer analysis when packaging
  • dialyzerOptions: will be passed to dialyzer, see http://www.erlang.org/doc/man/dialyzer.html
  • dialyzerWarningsAreErrors: will break the build when a dialyzer run returns warnings
  • dialyzerWithDependencies: will include the projects dependencies into the dialyzer run. Only for packaging erlang-otp.

Compiler

  • debugInfo: will compile all modules with debug information
  • erlcOptions: will be passed to erlc when compiling sources, see http://www.erlang.org/doc/man/compile.html
  • erlcTestOptions: will be passed to erlc when compiling test sources, see http://www.erlang.org/doc/man/compile.html

Documentation

  • eDocOptions: will be passed to edoc:files/2 or edoc:application/2, see http://www.erlang.org/doc/man/edoc.html

Testing

  • test: will only run this test case / test module
  • skipTests: will skip the eunit tests for this maven run
  • failIfNoTests: will break the build if no eunit tests are found in the project

Application Packaging

  • failOnUndeclaredModules: will break the build when the application file does not contain all found modules

Release Packaging

  • tarOptions: will be passed to systools:make_tar/2, see http://www.erlang.org/doc/man/systools.html
  • scriptOptions: will be passed to systools:make_script/2, see http://www.erlang.org/doc/man/systools.html
  • relupOptions: will be passed to systools:make_relup/4, see http://www.erlang.org/doc/man/systools.html
  • subsequentVersions: a list of versions to downgrade from when this release is installed, refers to the DownTo argument in systools:make_relup/4
  • previousVersions: a list of versions to upgrade from when this release is installed, refers to the UpFrom argument in systools:make_relup/4
